full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 737 Filed 07/22/22 Page 5 of 101 5 M6SQmax1 used the victim notification page on the U.S. Attorney's Office website regarding this case about the upcoming sentencing. THE COURT: And you posted the Court's order there regarding a process for submission of statements. MS. MOE: Yes, your Honor. THE COURT: Thank you. We'll turn to the presentence report. Ms. Sternheim, I know that you have because you've objected to a lot which we will talk about, but for the record, have you read the presentence report and discussed it with your client? MS. STERNHEIM: Yes, your Honor. And, if I may, Mr. Everdell will handle the objections portion of our presentation. THE COURT: Okay. We'll get to that in just a moment. Thank you. Ms. Maxwell, can you please confirm that you've read the presentence report and had a full opportunity to discuss it with your counsel? THE DEFENDANT: I did have an opportunity to read it. THE COURT: And an opportunity to discuss it with your counsel? THE DEFENDANT: I did. THE COURT: Okay. Ms. Moe, for the record, have you reviewed the SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00011524
